channel.title: Monster Drops
channel.description:
How Do I Make A Certain Npc Drop Like Say A Chicken(41) Drop a White Party Hat(1048). Don't Say npcdrops.cfg, Because I already Tried That. I Think It's In One Of My Items, And NPCHandler.java, But Not Sure Exactly What To Do Or Look For.
Any Help Appreciated. :)

item.title: Monster Drops
item.dc:creator: @The_Holy_One The Holy One
item.description:
@The_Holy_One wrote:

easy, first open up item, item2, item3, item 4.java (any is fine)

then scroll to bottom then add this

[code]public static int watever[] = {ItemID,ItemID,ItemID,ItemID};

public static int randomwatever()
{
return watever[(int)(Math.random()*watever.length)];
}[/code]

change watever to like demon if your doing abysal demons(something you can recognise)

then change the itemids to what you want, so you wanted a white p hat drop to be rare, do a nubby item like 10 rune pl8 ids then a white p hat, that means chances of white p hat = 1/11 to get in drop.

then save and close and open up npchandler.java

then scroll to bottom and add:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 41) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomwatever(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 2, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

change the:

npcType == 41)

that id to watever the monster id is and its done, remember to change the watever to what you changed it to on the first part.

Read full topic
